firstNightReminder: Show 1 character token from 3 character types, only 1 of which is in-play.
name: Tailor
ability: You start knowing 1 character from 3 character types, only 1 of which is in-play.
flavor: Sir Armun has ordered for such exquisite outfits to the circus. Such eccentric ones too. Is he the main event, a spectator or someone who wishes to disrupt the show?

firstNightReminder: Show the token of a Minion in-play.
otherNightReminder: The Star Pierce points to a player. Nod yes or shake no to indicate if they are the target.
name: Star Pierce
ability: You start knowing an in-play Minion. Each night*, guess who it is: learn if you're right.
flavor: Attack. Reduce cooldown of all Attack cards by 2

jinxes.reason: If the Star Pierce learns that the Vizier is in-play, the existence of the Vizier is not announced by the Storyteller.

firstNightReminder: Show Focus a piece of paper with the answer to the question.
name: Focus
ability: You start knowing the answer to a question. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.
flavor: Gain 3 Focus status

firstNightReminder: The Cynic points to a player. If they are an evil character, show them that character token. Otherwise show them any evil character token.
otherNightReminder: The Cynic points to a player. If they are an evil character, show them that character token. Otherwise show them any evil character token.
name: Cynic- Ï€
ability: Each night, choose a player: learn an evil character they are, or could be.
flavor: That's what a Demon would say.

firstNightReminder: Show Jump Strike the character type of the marked player via the reminder tokens.
otherNightReminder: Show Jump Strike the character type of the marked player via the reminder tokens.
name: Jump Strike
ability: Each night, learn the character type of the previously learnt player's clockwise neighbor (skipping Travellers).
flavor: Attack twice. After the attack, if the card was placed in an odd-numbered position on the field, increase the Attack Power of this card by 1 & refuce cooldown by 4

firstNightReminder: The Interceptor points to a good character. If it is in-play, point to 2 players, 1 of which is that character. Otherwise point to any 2 players.
otherNightReminder: The Interceptor points to a good character. If it is in-play, point to 2 players, 1 of which is that character. Otherwise point to any 2 players.
name: Interceptor
ability: Each night, choose a good character (not yours): learn that it is between 2 players. If not-in-play, learn false info.
flavor: Gotcha.

otherNightReminder: A good player who voted against the Count dies.
name: Count
ability: Each night*, a good player who voted against you today dies.
flavor: Guards, seize this one!

otherNightReminder: The Ammo Blast nods "Yes" or shakes their head "No". If they nodded, choose a good player that can die tonight. That player dies.
name: Ammo Blast
ability: Each night*, you may choose that a player of your alignment dies.
flavor: Attack twice by damage of 3 + number of remaining Arcana. Reduce Arcana to 0

otherNightReminder: The Fortify points to a player. They cannot die tonight, mark them with the Safe token. If they chose evil, Fortify is drunk, mark them with the Drunk token.
name: Fortify
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they can't die tonight. If you chose an evil player, you are drunk.
flavor: Gain 12 Barrier

jinxes.reason: If the Leviathan is in-play, the Fortify-protected player is safe from all evil abilities.
If Riot is in-play, the Fortify-protected player is safe from all evil abilities.

otherNightReminder: The Templar points to 2 players, mark the 1st with the Holy token and the second with the Smote token. If the Demon kills the Holy player and is not the Smote player, the Holy player lives and the Smote player dies.
name: Templar
ability: Each night*, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): if the Demon kills the 1st, the 2nd, if not the Demon, dies instead.
flavor: The Lord is with me always. In hardship, in times of distress, times of celebration and times of success.

jinxes.reason: If the Leviathan is in-play, the Templar-protected player is safe from all evil abilities.
If Riot is in-play, the Templar-protected player is safe from all evil abilities.

otherNightReminder: Change and run the Mystery Attack's ability.
name: Mystery Attack
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn what your ability is tonight & tomorrow.
flavor: At the start of battle: Transform into a random Attack card. Turn back after battle

jinxes.reason: The Mystery Attack when learning their next ability will always receive true information.
The Mystery Attack when learning their next ability will always receive true information.

firstNightReminder: The Overdrive shakes head "no" or points to a player. If they pointed: mark them with the "No Ability" token and show them that players character token. If that player is a Townsfolk, mark them with the Drunk token.
otherNightReminder: If the Overdrive still has their ability: the Overdrive shakes head no or points to a player. Show them that players character token. If that player is a Townsfolk, they are drunk, mark them with the Drunk token.
name: Overdrive
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a non-Traveller player: you learn their character. Chosen Townsfolk are drunk, even if you die.
flavor: No enemy cards on the field next Phase. Change HP to the number of cards on cooldown x 2

name: Hope
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any question & learn some answers (only 1 is correct).
flavor: Recover HP by 8 and gain 4 Barrier

otherNightReminder: If the Spirit was killed by the Demon, mark them with the Ascended token as a reminder they learn info. Show them all the in-play Demons and Minions.
name: Spirit
ability: If the Demon kills you, from now on you know the in-play evil characters.
flavor: I must go, I must ascend. To the Realm Beyond.

jinxes.reason: Each night*, the Leviathan chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Spirit uses their ability but does not die.
Each night*, Riot chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Spirit uses their ability but does not die.

name: Inverse Strike
ability: The 1st time an evil player chooses you with their ability at night, an evil player is chosen instead.
flavor: Attack then reduce cooldown of Magic cards

firstNightReminder: After the evil info steps, show each Minion Shadow Pierce's token.
name: Shadow Pierce
ability: If both of you guess each other, good wins. Minions know that if they publicly guess you (once), evil wins. [+1 Shadow Pierce]
flavor: Attack & if there's another card user's card on the field, transform it to Shadow Pierce

jinxes.reason: A Shadow Pierce cannot turn evil.
The Marionette does not learn that the Shadow Pierces are in-play.
A Shadow Pierce cannot turn evil.
If a Pit Hag attempts to create a Shadow Pierce & there are spare tokens, the Storyteller chooses good players equal to spare tokens to become Shadow Pierces.
The Spy may choose to not see the Grimoire. If they do see the Grimoire, evil does not win from correctly guessing a Shadow Pierce.

On the Widow's first night, they may choose to not see the Grimoire. Instead all in-play character tokens are shown to them. They choose 1 of those to poison. If they chose to see the Grimoire, evil does not win from correctly guessing a Shadow Pierce. The Widow cannot choose a Shadow Pierce to poison.

firstNightReminder: Point to up to 2 players.
name: Whisper
ability: You start knowing up to 2 players: what happens to you might happen to them & vice versa, even if you die, are drunk or poisoned.
flavor: Inflict 3 Sensitive

otherNightReminder: If Stress died: choose if a Minion's ability will work twice. If so, wake that Minion, show them the "This character selected you" token and Stress' character token. Mark them with the Works Twice token. Their ability works twice now. Wake Stress, signal them a thumbsup to indicate their ability is in effect.
name: Stress
ability: Each night, if you died, a Minion's ability might work twice until dusk. You & they learn this.
flavor: Does nothing. Disappears when used or after battle

jinxes.reason: The Marionette does not learn they are affected by Stress' ability.
A Stress boosted Mezepheles cannot create 2 evil players.
If the Summoner's ability works twice due to Stress, the second Demon they create retains their alignment. If the Summoner creates 2 evil Demons, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

firstNightReminder: Point to a player and mark them with the Mad token. If Feint is not marked with the Minion token and that player is a Minion, choose to show them the Minion token and mark Feint with it.
otherNightReminder: Point to a player and mark them with the Mad token. If Feint is not marked with the Minion token and that player is a Minion, choose to show them the Minion token and mark Feint with it.
name: Feint
ability: Each night, learn a player: you are mad they are evil tomorrow or 1 of you might be executed. Once, you learn they are a Minion.
flavor: Gain 3 Feint Status

otherNightReminder: At the earliest oppurtunity after the Coda's death, wake the Demon. Show them the "This character selected you" info card and Coda's token then the character token of the Minion whose ability they have. The Demon now has that ability.
name: Coda
ability: When you die, the Demon gains a Minion ability & learns which.
flavor: Reduce opponent HP by 5. Reset cooldown of other cards on the field if opponent was defeated by this card

jinxes.reason: If the Demon gains the Baron's ability, up to 2 players become not-in-play Outsiders.
If the Coda is executed and the Demon would gain the Boomdandy's ability, it instead triggers immediately.
If the Coda dies and would give the False Idol's ability, a Minion gains it instead and learns so.
Up to 3 extra players learn that the Hunter is in-play. If the Hunter's ability is created midgame, those are its targets. If no possible targets, the Hunter's ability cannot be put into play.
If the Demon has a neighbor who can be a Marionette and Coda would give the Marionette ability, they become an evil Marionette. This fails if there is already an extra evil player.
If the Coda dies and would give the Masterminds's ability, a Minion gains it instead and learns so.
If the Coda dies and would give the Scarlet Woman's ability, a Minion gains it alongside their own instead and learns so.
The Demon cannot create an in-play Demon. If they create an out of play Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
If the Coda dies and would give the Vizier's ability, a living Minion gains it alongside their own.

otherNightReminder: If a Trauma just died, wake them and show them the "You are" card then Trauma's character token. If their character on the Grimoire is not Trauma, take a spare Trauma token and replace their character with it. Mark a Townsfolk with Is Trauma token. They are Trauma now.
name: Trauma
ability: When you die, learn your character then a Townsfolk becomes a Trauma, thinks they are a Townsfolk & learns false info.
flavor: Take 4 damage. Disappears from deck when used in Battle. Cannot be lost or dissolved

jinxes.reason: Players turned into Trauma through its ability learn only true info if the Vortox is alive, sober and healthy.

name: Showtime
ability: If you die & 5 or more non-Travellers live, choose an alive player: if they are not executed tomorrow, your team loses.
flavor: Gain 2 Automana status & reduce cooldown of Attack cards by 2

jinxes.reason: If the Showtime chooses the same player as the Hagumoth, the Showtime is poisoned.

firstNightReminder: Show the Hunter an up to 3 in-play good character tokens. Wake 1 of these players up, show them Hunter's character token and put them to sleep. Repeat until all have woken up.
name: Hunter
ability: You start knowing up to 3 in-play good characters (they learn this). If they are all dead, your team wins.
flavor: if you're not willing to obey, then only the end awaits you

jinxes.reason: The Hunter cannot have a Exorcist as their target.
The Hunter cannot have a Heretic as their target.
The Hunter cannot have a King as their target.
The Hunter cannot have a Lunatic as their target.
Up to 3 extra players learn that the Hunter is in-play. If the Hunter's ability is created midgame, those are its targets. If no possible targets, the Hunter's ability cannot be put into play.
The Spy may choose to not see the Grimoire. If they do see the Grimoire, evil does not win from the Hunter's ability.

On the Widow's first night, they may choose to not see the Grimoire. Instead all in-play character tokens are shown to them. They choose 1 of those to poison. If they chose to see the Grimoire, evil does not win from the Hunter's ability.

firstNightReminder: Show each of the Outsider tokens in-play.
name: Biter
ability: You start knowing which Outsiders are in-play. Dead Outsiders poison 1 Townsfolk neighbor. [-1 to +1 Outsider]
flavor: Chomp Chomp

jinxes.reason: The Heretic starts knowing an out-of-play Outsider & registers as that Outsider to Biter.

firstNightReminder: The Hagumoth points to a player. Wake that player, show them the "This character selected you" token and then Hagumoth's character token then put them to sleep. Mark them with the Chosen token. Tomorrow, if they are executed, their team loses.
otherNightReminder: The Hagumoth points to a player. Wake that player, show them the "This character selected you" token and then Hagumoth's character token then put them to sleep. Mark them with the Chosen token. Tomorrow, if they are executed, their team loses.
name: Hagumoth
ability: Each night, choose a player: they learn this. If they are executed tomorrow, their team loses.
flavor: Through the path of Umalaaq, I stand upon thy grave. Through the will of the One Beyond, I break thy spirit. Through the ends of Heaven and Hell, I cut thy heart.

jinxes.reason: If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Hagumoth ability in addition to their own and learns this.
The Vizier wakes with the Hagumoth, learns who they choose and cannot choose to immediately execute that player tomorrow.

otherNightReminder: The Tyrant points to a player. That player dies. If the Demon is marked with the Overthrown token, they do not wake tonight. If they do not, wake them as normal and then mark them with the Overthrown token.
name: Tyrant
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The Demon wakes every other night, even if you are dead, drunk or poisoned.
flavor: We shall dance, challenger

jinxes.reason: The Tyrant registers as the Demon to the Banshee.
The Lil' Monsta's ability does not kill every other day/night cycle.
The Tyrant registers as the Demon to the Monk.
If the Tyrant kills the Sage, the Sage learns the Demon is 1 of 2 players.
The Tyrant registers as the Demon to the Spirit.
The Yaggababble's ability does not kill every other day/night cycle.
If the Tyrant is in-play, the Zombuul instead wakes every other night that no player died that day.

firstNightReminder: Mark the Corrupted with both Has Ability tokens.
otherNightReminder: If the Corrupted has its ability, the Corrupted shakes head "no" or points to 2 players. Mark the first player with the Choice 1 token and the second with the Choice 2 token. Remove a Has Ability token from Corrupted. Announce that both players have been chosen by the Corrupted in that order and the rules of its ability. Run the countdown then add and remove shrouds as necessary.
name: Corrupted
ability: Twice per game, at night*, choose 2 players: all players silently vote for who lives & who dies, you break ties.
flavor: Do not worry, your death will be swift and painless

firstNightReminder: Wake all Marusok 1 by 1. Show them each a not in-play Demon ability and replace their tokens with the corresponding Demon. Mark them with the Is Marusok tokens.
name: Marusok
ability: You have a not-in-play Demon ability & register as them too. Evil players might not wake. [All Minions are Marusok]
flavor: I am the Infinite Spiral, the herald of The One Beyond. What are you?

jinxes.reason: Corr. Sylphy's ability only checks the last night they woke.
If the Engineer successfully creates Marusok, all Minions become Marusok.
Marusok can be invited alongside a Demon. If it is, all Minions become Marusok except the Invitee, who becomes the invited Demon.
The Kazali may choose Marusok's Demon abilities. If they made a Marusok, all Minions become Marusok.
If Marusok has the Legion ability, other Marusok might have it as well. The Demon might be Legion too.
Demons may choose to not attack when they wake. If the Po wakes and the last Demon to wake chose to not attack, they choose 3 players.
The Summoner may choose to create Marusok as well as their Demon. If they do, all Minions become Marusok and the Summoner-chosen player becomes the chosen Demon.

firstNightReminder: You may wake the Grave if needed.
otherNightReminder: You may wake the Grave if needed.
name: Grave
ability: You may ask a question that, if good wins, all players learn. If most good players are wrong, evil wins instead.
flavor: you shall not pass

otherNightReminder: Wake a good player neighboring any Minion. Show them the "You are" card then a thumb-down 'evil' hand sign and Cultist's character token. Put them to sleep. Mark both of their Townsfolk neighbors with the Safe tokens. Those players are safe from the Demon.
name: Cultist
ability: Your Townsfolk neighbors are safe from the Demon. [+1 Minion. You neighbor a Minion]
flavor: For centuries we have been watching and waiting for a sign, embedding ourselves in the most prestigious of positions and the lowest trenches of society. Now we have been blessed with the Revelation from the One Beyond. Have you not woken?

firstNightReminder: Move the Stage token 1 step clockwise.
otherNightReminder: Move the Stage token 1 step clockwise. If it reaches False Idol, do not move it anymore.
name: False Idol
ability: After day 6, evil wins. Until just you, the Demon & another player live, good can't win by killing the Demon.
flavor: LISTEN TO ME, WATCH ME, LOVE ME!

jinxes.reason: A dead False Idol cannot stop good from winning through killing the Demon.
A dead False Idol cannot stop good from winning through killing the Demon.
A dead False Idol cannot stop good from winning through killing the Demon.

name: Enra - Ï€
ability: On the final day, before nominations & even if you die, the Demon may publicly choose a player: they are "the Demon" instead.
flavor: ... And it shall be our duty to slay the children of the wretched witch as our only way to reply to her sins

firstNightReminder: Wake all Minions. They will point to a player. Wake that player, give them the Invitation Letter's token and mark them with the Invitee token.
otherNightReminder: Wake all Minions. They will point to a player. Wake that player, give them the Invitation Letter's token and mark them with the Invitee token. If it is night 3, they point to a Demon on the character sheet. Show them the "You are" card and the relevant Demon token.
name: Invitation Letter
ability: Each night, Minions choose who holds the Invitation Letter. On night 3, the Invitee chooses a Demon to become. [+1 Minion]
flavor:
"You must play with at least 1 friend."

Requirements: 
 - A room with an open roof
 - An alive, human (recommended) sacrifice
 - Surgical equipment
 - An item representing the horror you wish to unleash
 - A new moon

Preparations:

*The rest of the letter is missing*

jinxes.reason: If the Invitation Letter is in-play, the Clockmaker does not receive their info until a Demon is successfully invited.

If the Engineer removes the Invitation Letter from play, the Invitee becomes the chosen Demon. If the Engineer creates the Invitation Letter before night 4, the Demon becomes a not-in-play Minion Invitee. Otherwise nothing happens.
If the Hatter dies, the Invitee can choose a Demon to become. If the Demon chooses Invitation Letter, they also choose a Minion to become and are the Invitee.
If Legion is invited, most players (including all evil players) become evil Legion.
If a Minion invites Lord of Typhon, they choose 1 of their neighbors to become an evil Lord of Typhon instead.
Each night, the Magician chooses a Minion: if that Minion & the Invitation Letter are alive, that Minion is the Invitee.
The Marionette neighbors a Minion, not the Demon. The Marionette is not woken to choose who takes the Invitation Letter's token. The other Minions know the Marionette.
If the Poppy Grower is in-play, Minions don't wake together. They are woken one by one, until one of them chooses to be the Invitee.
The Invitee may choose to invite Pukka on night 2.
On night 3, if a dead player becomes the Invitee, they may choose to invite Zombuul. If they do, they become a Zombuul that has died once.

firstNightReminder: Announce to everyone all of the Hand of Fate's abilities. The Hand of Fate signals a number. Note it down and show them the card with the ability they now have.
otherNightReminder: The Hand of Fate signals a number. Note it down and show them the card with the ability they now have. After they are done: they shake their head "no" then point to a player. That player dies.
name: Hand of Fate
ability: Each night, choose a number: gain that ability. Each night*, choose a player: they die. All players start knowing your abilities.
flavor: the time has come for you to return where you belong

otherNightReminder: Estelle points to a player. That player dies. If that player was a Minion, they keep their ability and point to a player. That player dies.
name: Estelle
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability and choose a player: they die.
flavor: No... Please stop. I don't want to hurt you

otherNightReminder: Signal (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) how many players Corr. Sylphy can point to. They point to that many players. Those players die and mark Corr. Sylphy with a Kill Chain token unless they already have 4.
name: Corr. Sylphy
ability: Each night*, choose 1 more player than last night (up to 5): they die. If a Minion died today, choose 1 instead.
flavor: Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor Traitor...

otherNightReminder: The Zhobazhbu points to a player. That player dies. If that player was a Minion, they keep their ability and reverse Townsfolk info.
name: Zhobazhbu
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & reverse Townsfolk info. [-1 Outsider]
flavor: Bathe within the flames, such that they purify thee of thy sin of weakness and frailty. Through atonement for thy mortality thou shalt be embraced by The One Beyond.

jinxes.reason: If the Demon kills the Banshee, players still learn that they have died.

otherNightReminder: The Sabnock points to a player. That player dies. If they were an Outsider, their Townsfolk neighbor closer to Sabnock is poisoned, mark them with a Poisoned token.
name: Sabnock
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Outsiders you kill poison the closest Townsfolk neighbor to you. [+1 Outsider]
flavor: Attrape des vers, salope.

jinxes.reason: Traumas created by its own ability do not register as Outsiders to the Sabnock.

firstNightReminder: Show Reverie all the events and they point to 1. Tomorrow, announce that event to everyone. Place the Final Hour token an equivalent steps anti-clockwise to Reverie as the day of the event and mark Reverie with as many New Day tokens as Final Hour token reaches Reverie prematurely.
otherNightReminder: Reverie points to a player. That player dies.
name: Reverie
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. On your 1st night, choose from a list of events. All players learn your choice.
flavor: I gave your kind a chance. But it turned out to be a waste of time.

otherNightReminder: Madeline points to a player. That player dies.
name: Madeline
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. The closest Townsfolk equal to nights clockwise to you are poisoned until 3 are.
flavor: If only you knew your place! But its too late now!

firstNightReminder: Wake the Destiny if you need or want.
otherNightReminder: The Destiny points to a player. That player dies. They may signal or text you their prediction.
name: Destiny
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Once per game, you may make a prediction: if accepted, it will come true at a price.
flavor: Applaud me! For I am the God of the new world!

otherNightReminder: The Plank of Wood points to a player. That player dies.
name: Plank of Wood
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If just 3 players live (excluding Travellers), good only wins if no-one is executed.
flavor: *Plank of Wood noises*

jinxes.reason: The Plank of Wood cannot be removed or brought into play by the Hatter's ability.
The Plank of Wood cannot be removed or brought into play by the Pit-Hag's ability. If the Pit-Hag creates a Plank of Wood, they swap characters with the previous Plank of Wood.

firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to Time for as long as they need. Time then points to all the players, use an external notepad to mark down the order they are pointed at. Put them to sleep.
otherNightReminder: The next player on the list of players chosen by Time without a shroud dies.
name: Time
ability: On your 1st night, see the Grimoire & choose all players. Each night*, the next alive player chosen dies, even if they could not.
flavor: You cannot stop time. All you can do is run away from this reality. How far will you run away this time I wonder?

jinxes.reason: The Damsel starts knowing a not-in-play Outsider and registers as it to Time.
The Heretic starts knowing an out-of-play Outsider & registers as that Outsider to Time.
When Time sees the Grimoire, the Minion and Magician tokens are removed.
geniunely just dont. i dont even have an idea for a jinx
geniunely just dont. i dont even have an idea for a jinx

firstNightReminder: Announce the day before evil wins. Move the Break Point token one step clockwise. If it reaches Fall. Charlotte, remove a New Cycle token.
otherNightReminder: Move the Break Point token one step clockwise. If it reaches Fall. Charlotte, remove a New Cycle token. If there were none, do not move it any more.
name: Fall. Charlotte
ability: All players start knowing a day. After that day, at dusk, evil wins. Nominations bring it closer by 1 (2 if Demon nominee).

jinxes.reason: Each night*, Fall. Charlotte chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Banshee dies & gains their ability.
If the Exorcist chooses Fall. Charlotte, tomorrow, nominations do not bring the final day closer.
Each night*, Fall. Charlotte chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Farmer uses their ability but does not die.
If Fall. Charlotte is in-play, the Fortify-protected player is safe from all evil abilities.
If Fall. Charlotte is in-play and the Grandchild was nominated, the final day comes closer by 2 instead of 1.
If Fall. Charlotte is in-play, the Innkeeper-protected players are safe from all evil abilities.
If Fall. Charlotte is in-play, and at least 1 player is dead, the King learns an alive character each night.
If Fall. Charlotte and Mayor are both in-play and no execution occurs on the final day, good wins instead.
If Fall. Charlotte is in-play, the Monk-protected player is safe from all evil abilities.
Each night*, Fall. Charlotte chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Ravenkeeper uses their ability but does not die.
Each night*, Fall. Charlotte chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Sage uses their ability but does not die.
If Fall. Charlotte is in-play, the Soldier is safe from all evil abilities.
Each night*, Fall. Charlotte chooses an alive good player (different to previous nights): a chosen Spirit uses their ability but does not die.
If Fall. Charlotte is in-play, the Templar-protected player is safe from all evil abilities.
